entries.name: 咒术回战
entries.description: 今年我们有六个月的《咒术回战》。跟我一起说：六个月！在涩谷事变篇毁灭性的结局之后，这部剧停播了两年，如今突然大量回归，这让我既兴奋又恐惧，因为我将不得不忍受即将到来的痛苦，看着剩下的Jujutsu Sorcerers们奋力击败Kenjaku，将Satoru Gojo从Prison Realm中解救出来。我们还会失去多少朋友？拜托，一个都不要好吗？ — Vanessa

entries.name: 末日逃生2：迁移
entries.description: 仅仅因为我对Greenland的具体内容没什么印象，并不意味着我不会再次预订前往这个几乎被摧毁的Kingdom of Denmark的旅行。这部续集讲述了Gerard Butler一家不得不逃离他们赖以为家的地堡，因为撞击地球的彗星带来了新的威胁。预告片里提到一个陨石坑可能是humankind的salvation和rebirth的关键；我当时没有完全认真看trailer。Butler饰演King Leonidas已经过去二十年了，但很少有其他演员能说他们主演了三个当前franchises（the Fallen series, Den of Thieves, and Greenland）。 — Arno

entries.name: 猩疯血雨
entries.description: 我们总是在寻找“Our Favorite When Animals Attack Movies”的新成员，而Primate凭借其practical effects和creatively gruesome kills赢得了它的一席之地，片中一只pet research chimp感染了rabies，并对它的masters降下hell。我有幸在Fantastic Fest上观看了这部电影，如果一群horror hounds的集体尖叫能说明什么的话，那Primate将带来一场raucous late-night cinema experience。 — James

entries.name: 夜班经理
entries.detail: Season 2 premieres on Prime Video Jan. 11
entries.description: 一个spy怎么可能和他的intended target发生three-way？这就是“The Night Manager” Season 2将带给我们的wtf-ness。新一季距离Tom Hiddleston饰演的gorgeous chameleon, Jonathan Pine，traversed across Europe into Africa to bring down arms dealer Richard Roper（Hugh Laurie饰）已经整整十年了。我们再次与Pine联系，他被dispatched to South America to infiltrate the operation of another arms dealer，而这位arms dealer恰好是Roper的criminal descendant。Everyone in the cast is hot，包括回归执掌Pine’s home team operation的Olivia Colman。我刚刚得知，最近主演了Hamnet的Noah Jupe饰演Roper的儿子，他正在continuing his father’s traditions。 — Arno

entries.name: Star Trek: Starfleet Academy
entries.description: 我有点惊讶，竟然花了这么长时间才推出一部关于Starfleet Academy的series。With all of the built-in angst and drama that comes with being students at the most exclusive school in the galaxy, the setting is ripe for storytelling。Set in the 32nd century during the same era as Star Trek: Discovery, we'll see some familiar faces alongside the roster of new students, including Tig Notaro, Oded Fehr, and Mary Wiseman from Discovery。Plus, Robert Picardo from Star Trek: Voyager reprises his role as the holographic doctor。I'm most excited for the newcomers to the Star Trek universe: Holly Hunter as Captain Nahla Ake, chancellor of Starfleet Academy, and Paul Giamatti as the newest baddie, a half-Klingon named Nus Braka。Keep an ear out for the unmistakable voice of Stephen Colbert as the Digital Dean of Students。 — Vanessa

entries.name: Agatha Christie's Seven Dials
entries.description: An Agatha Christie mini-series is everything I need for a wintry January weekend。And “Seven Dials,” which follows a socialite trying to solve a murder that went down at a ritzy house party, is just three episodes – that means no waiting around for 40 minutes like when you watched Wake Up Dead Man for the main character to arrive。The mystery marks the beginning of Mia McKenna-Bruce’s ascendancy, as the How to Have Sex star prepares for everyone to know her name once Sam Mendes’ Beatles biopics come out (McKenna-Bruce will play Mo Starkey, Ringo Starr’s first wife, in the film series)。 — Arno

entries.name: 惊变28年2：白骨圣殿
entries.description: It’s about to get even more terrifying on the English mainland as Jimmy Crystal makes like A Clockwork Orange and brings his wild bunch to the doorstep of Dr. Kelson’s bone temple。The 28 Years Later sequel, which wisely arrives less than a year after the first movie, picks up right where 28YL left off, with the promise that Cillian Murphy’s Jim will make a “surreal” appearance – that’s how director Nia DaCosta describes it – to set up the third movie in the trilogy, which has been greenlighted by the studio。 — Arno

entries.name: ALL YOU NEED IS KILL
entries.description: Answering the question, What if Groundhog’s Day but war?, this animated sci-fi flick follows a soldier as she attempts to escape a time loop during an alien invasion。We’re prepared for a visual spectacle from the lauded Japanese animation house Studio 4°C, and if this all sounds familiar, don’t worry。You’re not trapped in a temporal anomaly of your own; you’re just remembering the Tom Cruise movie Edge of Tomorrow, which was based on the same novel by Hiroshi Sakurazaka。 — Adrienne

entries.name: Vie privée
entries.description: A Private Life is a messy, imperfect thriller starring Jodie Foster as a therapist who experiences a hysterical episode in the wake of her client's mysterious death。The fact that she isn’t disbarred reminds you the movie is a high fantasy, and that diamonds can be formed from coal, provided you break free from the conventional world。There's an audience out there who will embrace Rebecca Zlotowski's unhinged fever dream that advocates for hypnotherapy as a means for later-life catharsis。 — Arno

entries.name: The Rip
entries.description: Matt and Ben are back together again this month on Netflix with a crime drama about Miami cops whose loyalties are tested when they discover buckets of cash during a raid。We suspect audiences will enjoy seeing this much-loved Gen X duo play opposite each other once again, and we bet it’s their enduring star power that pulled in such an impressive supporting cast, including Teyana Taylor, Kyle Chandler, Sasha Calle, Steven Yeun, and Nestor Carbonell, among others。 — Adrienne

entries.name: Night Patrol
entries.description: Reared on horror and crime classics of the late-20th century, director Ryan Prows (Lowlife) slams his influences together in this wild mashup, as a cop (Justin Long) discovers a deadly secret within a special task force in the LAPD。Drawing on vampire classics The Lost Boys and Near Dark, as well as crime thrillers like Menace II Society and Prince of the City, Night Patrol is a smorgasbord fit for hungry genre fans。 — James

entries.name: 七王国的骑士
entries.description: Be prepared for a very different Westeros in HBO’s latest “Game of Thrones” prequel。Based on George R. R. Martin’s “Tales of Dunk and Egg” novellas, “A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms” follows a newly minted knight and his little squire on their adventures throughout the land a century before Ned Stark’s untimely end。According to Martin, the six-episode season is “smaller in scale, more personal, with more humor, more focus on character … but there is danger and death as well。” Newcomers Peter Claffey and Dexter Sol Ansell star as the leading duo, and we’re excited to see where executive producers Ira Parker and Owen Harris — you know him as the director of the only heartwarming “Black Mirror” episode, “San Junipero” — take this lighter look at a beloved fantasy world。 — Adrienne

entries.name: The Beauty
entries.detail: Premieres on Hulu and Disney+ Jan. 21
entries.description: He’s at it again, folks。But if you made it through “Monster” and you found your footing with “All’s Fair,” then Ryan Murphy’s latest series might just be for you。Rather than describe its premise, it may be easier to give you the recipe。Take one part “The X-Files” and two parts The Substance, add in a dash of It Follows, and season liberally with real-world techno-terrorist billionaire behavior, and voila! You’re ready to taste test this high-camp sci-fi horror story。Still not convinced? Take a look at that cast。As usual, Murphy has assembled an A-list team that can’t be denied。 — Adrienne

entries.name: 重返寂静岭
entries.description: Long before the Backrooms, Silent Hill reigned supreme as the big daddy of liminal video game horror。The games’ central story about a fictional Maine town where nightmares manifest was a no-brainer for a movie adaptation, but after two early 2000s features, the franchise went dormant, leaving fans to wonder if they’d ever see the series on the big screen again。So it’s no wonder the third installment in the franchise is among your most anticipated of the year。Releasing 20 years after the first film, Return to Silent Hill draws on the second game’s narrative to tell a dark love story filled with mystery and death。 — Adrienne

entries.name: 奇迹人
entries.description: Yahya Abdul-Mateen II plays Simon Williams, a struggling actor set on being cast in a remake of the fictional film Wonder Man in this eight-episode miniseries set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe。Under the creative eye of showrunner Andrew Guest and co-creator Destin Daniel Crettin (Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings), “Wonder Man” takes a satirical look at the superhero movie factory, similar to how HBO Max and Apple TV recently skewered the genre in “The Franchise” and “The Studio,” respectively。But as an in-universe story, expect actual superhuman feats, as Abdul-Mateen II discovers he has real-life powers。Sir Ben Kingsley reprises his role as actor and former villain Trevor Slattery (aka the Mandarin) in his third MCU appearance, after Iron Man III and Shang-Chi。 — James

entries.name: 布里杰顿家族
entries.detail: Season 4, Part 1 and 2 premiere Jan. 29 and Feb. 26 on Netflix
entries.description: It's swoony season in the Ton again! We're quickly running out of Bridgertons to marry off, as this season it's Benedict's turn (the second oldest and most free-spirited of the sons) to get swept off his feet。We're getting full Cinderella vibes with the introduction of Sophie Baek (Yerin Ha), a maid who who catches Benedict's eye during a masquerade ball, but as Bridgerton tends to subvert expectations, we're excited to see how they navigate this social divide。 — Vanessa

entries.name: 荒岛求救
entries.description: Horror fans hit the search bar hard when they learned about this new horror flick from Sam Raimi, and for good reason。This satisfying satire about survival of the fittest lampoons office culture by giving the under-appreciated Linda (Rachel McAdams) the upper hand after she and a toxic colleague (Dylan O’Brien) are stranded on a tropical island。It’s been well over a decade since Raimi has directed a horror movie, and we’re excited to see the living legend return to the genre that kick-started his career more than 40 years ago。Oh, and yes, you saw that right。Raimi bestie Bruce Campbell looks likely to make a cameo appearance。To that, we say “Groovy。” — Adrienne

entries.name: The Moment
entries.description: Hey, if The Weeknd can get a movie like Hurry Up Tomorrow made, then Charli XCX absolutely should have her own mental health/pseudo-biopic, too。The Moment looks indulgent and cheeky, because Charli knows how to enjoy the absurdity of fame, not turn it into a dark ego trip。I’d proudly carry her Brat credit card if the interest rate was low。Alexander Skarsgård joins Charli’s troupe, playing the probably disturbed director of the movie within the movie。 — Arno

plotText.plainText: 一个男孩吞下了一个被诅咒的符咒——一根恶魔的手指——并因此被诅咒。他进入一所咒术学校，以便找到恶魔的其他身体部位，从而净化自己。

node.text: El día del fin del mundo: Migración
El día del fin del mundo: Migración
El día del fin del mundo: Migración
El Día Del Fin Del Mundo: Migración

plotText.plainText: 幸存的Garrity一家必须离开Greenland地堡的安全地带，踏上穿越被摧毁的Europe冰冻荒原的危险旅程，寻找新的家园。
一群朋友的热带度假之旅变成了一个terrifying, primal tale of horror and survival。

node.text: John le Carré's The Night Manager
John le Carré's The Night Manager
John le Carré's The Night Manager

plotText.plainText: Cairo一家hotel的night manager被recruited to infiltrate an arms dealer's inner circle。
Young cadets train to become Starfleet officers as they deal with friendships, rivalries, and romance, all while facing a mysterious threat to both the Academy and the Federation。

node.text: I sette quadranti di Agatha Christie
阿加莎·克里斯蒂之七面钟

plotText.plainText: In 1925, a country house party prank turns deadly。Lady Eileen "Bundle" Brent investigates the chilling murder plot。Lady Caterham and Superintendent Battle assist in solving the country house mystery that changes Bundle's life。

node.text: 28 anni dopo: Il tempio delle ossa
28 Anos Depois: O Templo dos Ossos
28 años después: El templo de los huesos
28 ans plus tard: Le temple des morts
28 Ans Plus Tard: Le Temple Des Morts

plotText.plainText: As Spike is inducted into Jimmy Crystal's gang on the mainland, Dr. Kelson makes a discovery that could alter the world。

node.text: オール ユー ニード イズ キル
殺無盡 ALL YOU NEED IS KILL

plotText.plainText: In a time loop during an alien invasion, a resourceful but isolated young woman must navigate the repetition of death until she crosses paths with a shy young man trapped in the same cycle。Together, they fight to break free from the loop。
The renowned psychiatrist Lilian Steiner mounts a private investigation into the death of one of her patients, whom she is convinced has been murdered。
A group of Miami cops discovers a stash of millions in cash, leading to distrust as outsiders learn about the huge seizure, making them question who to rely on。
An L.A. cop discovers a local task force is hiding a secret that puts the residents of his childhood neighborhood in danger。

El caballero de los Siete Reinos

plotText.plainText: A century before GOT, Ser Duncan the Tall, and his squire, Egg, wandered through Westeros while the Targaryen dynasty ruled the Iron Throne, and dragons were still remembered。Great destinies and enemies await the incomparable friends。

originalTitleText.text: A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms

plotText.plainText: Partners Drew Foster and Kara Vaughn investigate "the Beauty" STD causing aesthetic effects but proving lethal, evading corrupt officials and a mercenary targeting them amidst a suspected government conspiracy。

node.text: Terror em Silent Hill: Regresso para o Inferno
Terror En Silent Hill Regreso Al Infierno
Terror en Silent Hill: Regreso al infierno
サイレントヒルに戻る

plotText.plainText: When a man receives a mysterious letter from his lost love, he is drawn to Silent Hill, a once familiar town now consumed by darkness。
Hollywood actor Simon Williams is thrust into the world of superheroes as he gets powers of his own, and becomes the new superhero Wonder Man。
The eight close-knit siblings of the Bridgerton family look for love and happiness in London high society。

Two colleagues become stranded on a deserted island, the only survivors of a plane crash。On the island, they must overcome past grievances and work together to survive, but ultimately, it's a battle of wills and wits to make it out alive。
A rising pop star navigates the complexities of fame and industry pressure while preparing for her arena tour debut。
